content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sdgr34ogc63f64kpoc.dfs.core.windows.net/apidata/facts/catfact_*',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) with (
        fact text(256) collate Latin1_General_BIN2,
        load_date timestamp()
    ) AS rows
